resources.string: TimeLimit limits this device. There is no connection to other devices.
TimeLimit does not limit this device. It is used to configure TimeLimit on other devices. You have to sign in using an e-mail address.
connected device of a child or another parent
This device is linked to another one. All settings for TimeLimit can be changed from any linked device. You sign in by a code which was generated on another device on which TimeLimit is installed.

TimeLimit will not limit this device. This device will be one possible key to unlock the settings of TimeLimit at an other device which uses the local mode (there is always a password to unlock the settings).
Not a setup option. TimeLimit revokes all permissions which prevent an uninstallation (if any) and starts the deletion of itself.
